trans-unit.source: At any time, you have the right to retrieve the data you have provided to our site. Click on "Get my data" to automatically download a copy of your personal data on a pdf or csv file.
trans-unit.target: At any time, you have the right to retrieve the data you have provided to our site. Click on "Get my data" to automatically download a copy of your personal data on a pdf or csv file.
